thread.section_title: Eircom Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eircom | www.eircom.net
thread.title: Joan collins

author: Joan collins
title: Joan collins
text: Having on going issues with broadband for past 3 months, this is very frustrating as I have e vision so no tv either, I keep ringing customer service and each one of them tells me to do the same thing, reset the box, change modem etc, they just want to get me off the phone, as soon as I do it goes again.it's gone beyond a joke at this stage and I will not pay for a service that does not deliver, I am switching to sky
